title: Pharmaceutical Industry Regulatory Capture of FDA
description: Research the systematic capture of FDA regulatory processes by pharmaceutical companies through revolving door appointments, funding mechanisms, and policy influence from 1980s-present
research_notes: Focus on key officials moving between pharma companies and FDA, approval processes for controversial drugs, and suppression of safety data. Include cases like OxyContin approval, COVID-19 vaccine approvals, and influence on drug pricing policies.
next_steps: Research FDA commissioner appointments from pharmaceutical backgrounds, analyze fast-track approval processes, document pharmaceutical lobbying expenditures and regulatory outcomes
